column1: A Mass of Christian Burial  ill be held at 11 a.m.
column4: 2015 at St. John Catholic Church in Laddonia with Father Paul Hartley and Father Pat Pierceall officiating. Burial will be in Laddonia Cemetery.      Visitation will be Saturday from 9:30 a.m. until the time of service at St. John Catholic Church. Arrangements are under the direction of Bienhoff Funeral Home.
